snippet.title: "Faith of Danschant: Hereafter" offical Trailer
snippet.description:
"Faith of Danschant" unveiled the trailer of the sequel "Faith of Danschant: Hereafter" amidst "2020 Wangyuan Shengtang Carnival" on July 11. 

It's an Action-adventure RPG using UE4 engine. Combat and Adventure constitute the two core elements in tha game.

"Faith of Danschant: Hereafer’” Work in progress.
